short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides all the promotional articles (ads) and will check Post.news to find if your Twitter follows have a Post account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple Chrome Extension prevent advertisers from tracking you on Twitter by using CSS to hide the ads and promoted tweets in your feed.  This does not collect any information and is 100% free.  If you pin it to you header it will display a green icon when the twitter user you are looking at also has a Post.news account and if you can click on the icon to create a button that will take you right to their Post.news account so you can follow them.
